subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: David Edwards shot a seven-under-par 65 and held a two-stroke lead after two rounds of The Tradition, the fourth major of the year on the Champions Tour, in Sunriver, Ore. Edwards was at 12-under 132, ahead of Mark McNulty, who was at 10-under 134 after a 68.
